name: Rfc3339

unions.name: DateTime
unions.comment:
Represents one of:

  - **local time**: e.g. 09:15:22
  - **local date**: e.g. 1970-11-21 ([Date.Date](https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/justinmimbs/date/4.1.0/Date#Date))
  - **local date time**: e.g. 1970-11-21T09:15:22 ([Time.Extra.Parts](https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/justinmimbs/time-extra/1.2.0/Time-Extra#Parts))
  - **date time with offset**: e.g. 1970-11-21T09:15:22+01:00
cases: { instant : Time.Posix, offset : { hour : Basics.Int, minute : Basics.Int } }
{ hour : Basics.Int, minute : Basics.Int, second : Basics.Int, millisecond : Basics.Int }

unions.name: Error
unions.comment: All of the ways a parsing can fail.

values.name: dateTimeLocalParser
values.comment: Parser for a **local date time**: e.g. 1970-11-21T09:15:22 ([Time.Extra.Parts](https://package.elm-lang.org/packages/justinmimbs/time-extra/1.2.0/Time-Extra#Parts)).

values.name: dateTimeOffsetParser
values.comment: Parser for a **date time with offset**: e.g. 1970-11-21T09:15:22+01:00.
values.type: Parser.Advanced.Parser context Rfc3339.Error { instant : Time.Posix, offset : { hour : Basics.Int, minute : Basics.Int } }

values.name: parse
values.comment: Attempts to convert a `String` to a `DateTime`

values.name: timeLocalParser
values.type: Parser.Advanced.Parser context Rfc3339.Error { hour : Basics.Int, minute : Basics.Int, second : Basics.Int, millisecond : Basics.Int }

values.name: toString
values.comment: Prints an RFC3339 formatted String, using `T` as the date time separator and `Z` for an offset of 0 hours and 0 minutes.
